name: Escape The Lab (itch) (Strumbi)
description:
This version of the game is in early development. Consider that there will be a lot of bags and that optimization is not great even though this version is at low settings.

Full version of the game will be far more polished, mechanics will not be wonky and optimization will be far better. Also LVLs will look more finished.

 Minimum specs:

                                    -GTX 1660TI

                                    -Ryzen 5
